input_text:
Job Title: Senior Dotnet Developer

Location: New York City Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Hi,Greetings for the day!This is Sharif K from Amtex Systems,  Amtex Systems is Game Changing Innovators in technology across the world over two decades. We specialized in technology platforms and services in Software Development & Information Technology Consulting, Digital Media, Business Intelligence, Mobile Applications and Content Management. Amtex is ranked among the top 4 privately held companies in New York for Business Intelligence and Content Management solutions. Amtex provides solutions and services to clients in multiple domains including Technology, Financial Services, Media, Fashion, Retail and the Public Sector. Amtex is based in New York with offices located across the world. We are currently hiring for Amtex Systems for our US Clients for the role of .NET full stack developer .You can visit our website www.amtexsystems.com for more information.
 Full Stack Deveoper- NYC NY- hybridOn Site Work Location: 1 Centre St, New York, NY 10007 X Hybrid: Work location & Remote (3 days in office/2 days remote) Remote: Monday- Friday; 9-535 hour work week TASKS:  • Develop user interfaces with Angular and PrimeNG • Implement server-side logic using .NET • Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability. • Ensure application security and data protection.  MANDATORY SKILLS/EXPERIENCE Note: Candidates who do not have the mandatory skills will not be considered. • 10+ years of Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role • Strong knowledge of Angular and .NET frameworks • Proficiency in Angular-specific skills such as: o Understanding of Angular architecture and core concepts o Experience with Angular CLI o Familiarity with Angular’s RxJS and Observables o Experience with Angular Forms (Template Driven & Reactive Forms) • Experience with OAuth for authentication and authorization • Experience with database technology such as SQL Server • Excellent communication and teamwork skills • Degree in Computer Science, or relevant field  • Familiarity with Microsoft Dynamics 365 and cloud services (Azure) SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: N/A • Ability to work on-site and handle multiple projects. • Background check may be required.

Experience Level (if available): None

job_responsibilities: Develop user interfaces with Angular and PrimeNG
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Ensure application security and data protection
